footer.delete: We keep most recent 45,000 records and delete out-of-date data, so rankings are subject to change over time.
footer.battleRecords: Wanna do some research or write ranking algorithm?

main.tierListDesc: Tier list is based on {0} ★3 Battles.
main.mvcDesc: A character should credit its teammates. Inspired by Google website ranking, we adopt the concept of "Link Equity". Each character has "Usage Rate Ranking" as its initial score, then passes value and authority to its teammates. The more votes a character receives from others, the higher its ranking becomes.
main.comboDesc: These ★9 teams clear the whole floor {0} without swapping out members
main.comboCustomDesc: Select 1~8 characters that you like and get our recommendations
main.teammateDesc: Venti and Zhongli are excluded from this list since they are everywhere
